description:
Make tracks in this cross-country jacket that’s made to keep you in motion. Stretchy and weather-resistant, it provides warmth and breathability in equal measure, and won't get in the way when you’re pushing the pace. Back venting with a lightweight mesh lining keeps you comfortable when the action heats up.

  • Polyester R-Wind fabric blocks the wind and keeping the chill out
  • Lightweight polyester Bird Eye Mesh lining feels soft against the skin
  • Fabric has built in 4-way mechanical stretch to move with you
  • Back venting with lightweight mesh lining adds breathability
  • Packs down small for convenient storage
name: Rossignol Active Versatile XC Jacket - Women's
